/ˈkʌtɪŋ ||; ˈkʌtɪŋ/noun[C]
1 (US 美 clipping) a piece cut out from a newspaper, etc 剪报: press cuttings 剪报
2 a piece cut off from a plant that you use for growing a new plant 插枝；插条
cutting²
/ˈkʌtɪŋ ||; ˈkʌtɪŋ/adj (used about sth you say) unkind; meant to hurt sb's feelings （指说的话）不友好，尖刻: a cutting remark 尖刻的话

ˈcutting board
noun [C] (US 美) = chopping board

CV
/ˌsi: ˈvi: ||; ˌsi ˈvi/ (US 美 resumé) noun [sing] curriculum vitae; a formal list of your education and work experience, often used when you are trying to get a new job 简历

cwm
/kʊm ||; kum/ =CORRIE

cwt.
abbr a hundred weight; a measure of weight, about 50.8 kg 英担（重量单位，约等于50.8公斤）

cyanide
/ˈsaɪənaɪd ||; ˈsaɪəˌnaɪd/noun [U] a poisonous chemical 氰化物（一种有毒化学物质）

cybercafe
/ˈsaɪbəkæfeɪ ||; ˈsaɪbɚˌkæfe/noun [C] a cafe with computers where customers can pay to use the Internet 网络咖啡馆；网吧

cybernetics
/ˌsaɪbəˈnetɪks ||; ˌsaɪbɚˈnɛtɪks/noun [U] the scientific study of communication and control, in which, for example, human and animal brains are compared with machines and electronic devices 控制论

cyberspace
/ˈsaɪbəspeɪs ||; ˈsaɪbɚˌspes/noun [U] a place that is not real, where electronic messages exist while they are being sent from one computer to another 计算机空间，网络空间，网络空间（电子信息在发送过程中的所在地，其实并不存在）

*cycle¹
/ˈsaɪkl ||; ˈsaɪkḷ/noun[C]
1 the fact of a series of events being repeated many times, always in the same order 始终按同一规律重复发生的一连串事件；循环；周期: the carbon/nitrogen cycle 碳循环；氮循环 ☞pictures at carbon, nitrogen, rock and water 见carbon、nitrogen、rock及water插图
2 a bicycle or motor cycle 自行车；摩托车: a cycle shop 自行车店 [SYN] bike 同义词为bike
cycle²
/ˈsaɪkl ||; ˈsaɪkḷ/verb [I] to ride a bicycle 骑自行车: He usually cycles to school. 他通常骑自行车上学。 Go cycling is a common way of talking about cycling for pleasure We go cycling most weekends. 骑自行车游玩一般叫go cycling：We go cycling most weekends. 我们大多数周末骑自行车去游玩。
cyclic
/ˈsaɪklɪk;ˈsɪk-||; ˈsaɪklɪk/ (also cyclical /ˈsaɪklɪkl;ˈsɪk-/) adj following a repeated pattern 循环的；周期性的

cyclist
/ˈsaɪklɪst ||; ˈsaɪklɪst/noun [C] a person who rides a bicycle 骑自行车的人

cyclone
/ˈsaɪkləʊn ||; ˈsaɪklon/noun [C] a violent wind that moves in a circle causing a storm 气旋；暴风；旋风 ☞Look at the note at storm. 参看storm的注释。 ➔cyclonic /saɪˈklɒnɪk ||; saɪˈklɑnɪk/ adj

cygnet
/ˈsɪgnət ||; ˈsɪgnɪt/noun [C] the young of A SWAN (= a large white bird) 幼天鹅

cylinder
/ˈsɪlɪndə(r) ||; ˈsɪlɪndɚ/noun[C]
1 an object shaped like a tube 圆柱体 ☞picture at cube and solid 见cube及solid插图
2 a tube-shaped part of an engine, for example in a car 汽缸 ➔cylindrical /səˈlɪndrɪkl ||; sɪˈlɪndrɪkḷ/ adj

cymbal
/ˈsɪmbl ||; ˈsɪmbḷ/noun [C] [usu.pl] one of a pair of round metal plates used as a musical instrument. Cymbals make a loud ringing sound when you hit them together or with a stick. 钹 ☞picture at music 见music插图

cynic
/ˈsɪnɪk ||; ˈsɪnɪk/noun [C] a person who believes that people only do things for themselves, rather than to help others 愤世嫉俗者；不信任人或怀疑人的善意的人: Don't be such a cynic. He did it to help us, not for the money. 不要这么不信任人。他只是想帮我们，不是为了钱。 ➔cynical /ˈsɪnɪkl ||; ˈsɪnɪkəl/ adj a cynical remark 挖苦话 ➔cynically /-kli ||; -klɪ/ adv ➔ cynicism /ˈsɪnɪsɪzem ||; ˈsɪnəsɪzəm/ noun [U]

cypress
/ˈsaɪprəs ||; ˈsaɪprəs/noun [C] a tall straight tree of the kind that does not lose its leaves in winter(an evergreen) 柏（一种高大笔直的常青树）

Cyrillic
/səˈrɪlɪk/noun [U] the alphabet that is used in languages such as Russian 西里尔字母（如俄语所用的）

cyst
/sɪst ||; sɪst/noun [C] a swelling or a lump filled with liquid in the body or under the skin （体内或皮肤下的）囊肿

cystic fibrosis
/ˌsɪstɪk faɪˈbrəʊsɪs ||; ˌsɪstɪk faɪˈbrosɪs/noun [U] a serious medical condition that some people are born with, in which some organs do not work correctly. It can cause death. 胰囊性纤维变性（一种遗传性疾病，可导致死亡）

cystitis
/sɪˈstaɪtɪs ||; sɪsˈtaɪtɪs/noun [U] an infection, especially in women, of the organ in which liquid waste collects before leaving the body(the bladder)that makes it painful to go to the toilet 膀胱炎

cytology
/saɪˈtɒlədʒi ||; saɪˈtɑlədʒɪ/noun [U] the study of the structure and function of plant and animal cells 细胞学

cytoplasm
/ˈsaɪtəʊplæzəm ||; ˈsaɪtəˌplæzəm/noun [U] the material that a cell is made of, except for the NUCLEUS (= the central part) 细胞浆；胞质

czar, czarina
=TSAR, TSARINA
